comments.body:
Filter requirements must be installed before ansible-playbook is started, so you'll want to install them here:

https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/f49469f7bf42297ec47de16e7a5e851fbf1f442b/test/integration/targets/filters/runme.sh#L7

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +3,7 @@# Copyright: (c) 2019, Ansible Project

- name: a dummy task to test the changed and success filters
  shell: echo hi
